meanings.definition: A large body of people united by common descent, history, culture, or language, inhabiting a particular country or territory.
meanings.sent1: Many nations gathered for the peace summit.
meanings.sent2: The United Nations promotes global cooperation.
meanings.sent3: The pizza nations decided to have a topping competition.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, different nations compete like warriors.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of nations at the festival was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A community of people forming a state or inhabiting a territory.
meanings.sent1: The indigenous nations have rich traditions.
meanings.sent2: The Native American nations have a deep connection to the land.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream nations argued over the best flavor.
meanings.sent4: The nations of birds chirped harmoniously in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The coastal nations rely on fishing for their livelihood.

meanings.definition: A group or federation of tribes or peoples.
meanings.sent1: The nations of the Amazon rainforest work together to protect their home.
meanings.sent2: The ancient nations of Europe traded goods and knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The book nations debated which genre was the most popular.
meanings.sent4: The nations of stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The nations of insects buzzed in harmony during the summer.
